title: Episode #37 - W. Kamau Bell & ME
description: Stand up Comedian & Host of Totally Biased on FX, W. Kamau Bell and I sit down and talk about Race in America & Laugh a lot more than the media would like us to.
content:encoded: Stand up Comedian & Host of Totally Biased on FX, W. Kamau Bell and I sit down and talk about Race in America & Laugh a lot more than the media would like us to.
